ncbi.blast
Class NCBIBlastLocal

java.lang.Object
  ncbi.blast.NCBIBlastLocal

public class NCBIBlastLocal
extends java.lang.Object

This class runs a local blast using the ncbi genome database. ** Special Instructions** To use this class follow these steps:

  • Download the latest ncbi blast executable folder which can be downloaded here. Unzip/unpack this folder and place somewhere on your computer. It is this folder ("ncbi-blast...") that should be specified as the blast directory using the -l|-local option (CommandLineParser) and when using the window version of SolPicker.
  • Download the genome database files which can be found here The database files must be unpacked and put into the same directory. The directory for the folder containing the genome database files and blast executable must be specified using the -db argument (see CommandLineParser) followed by a reference to the alias file (see 3).
  • Create an alias file for the genome database. It should specify the names of all the chromosomes. Read me file.

    • Author:
    tizatt $Id: NCBIBlastLocal.html,v 1.1 2009/10/16 23:08:53 tizatt Exp $
    See Also:
